mapper.select: select kh.*,ly.lname,hy.hname,jb.jname from kh left join ly on kh.lid = ly.lid left join hy on kh.hid = hy.hid left join jb on kh.jid = jb.jid where kh.kid = #{kid}
mapper.update: update kh set kname = #{kname},kphone = #{kphone},kphonee = #{kphonee},lid = #{lid},hid = #{hid},jid = #{jid},klren = #{klren},kyou = #{kyou},jadd = #{jadd} where kid=#{kid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from kh left join ly on kh.lid = ly.lid left join hy on kh.hid = hy.hid left join jb on kh.jid = jb.jid
